EmailTemplate.description: US-0009791 - [SEP] Notification sent to Category Managers when Deal Window is updated to Status = 'CM Review'
EmailTemplate.name: Deal Window - Deals Ready for CM Review and Placement
EmailTemplate.subject: Deal Window {!EBH_DealRetailCampaign__c.Name} - {!EBH_DealRetailCampaign__c.EBH_DealTitle__c} : Deals Ready for CM Review and Placement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Category Managers:
Deal Window {!EBH_DealRetailCampaign__c.Name} - {!EBH_DealRetailCampaign__c.EBH_DealTitle__c} ( {!EBH_DealRetailCampaign__c.Start_Date_MM_DD_YYYY__c} - {!EBH_DealRetailCampaign__c.End_Date_MM_DD_YYYY__c} ) is now ready for Category Manager review. Please review the Deals for this Deal Window and Approve or Reject Deals which have a status of 'CM Review'. If you are approving a Deal, you must assign a Spotlight Category for the Deal. Deals which are not approved or rejected will automatically be updated to 'Scheduled' with placement defaulted to 'Verticals' in 1 day before the Deal Window start date.
You can update the List view filters to update your list view accordingly.
You can access the Deal Window with the following URL: {!EBH_DealRetailCampaign__c.Link}
Thanks, Hive Team
